itunes:title: Episode 797 - Live From The US - Mexico Border With Reporter James Klüg
title: Episode 797 - Live From The US - Mexico Border With Reporter James Klüg
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by independent journalist James Klüg to talk about his experience documenting the border crisis including the migrant detention centers, where the Trump border wall ends, the scores of unaccompanied children bei...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by independent journalist James Klüg to talk about his experience documenting the border crisis including the migrant detention centers, where the Trump border wall ends, the scores of unaccompanied children being snuck across, and illegal immigrants getting flights around the United States with envelopes of cash — plus James explains what he saw documenting the Capitol Riots.
